text: The 2007–08 Boston Bruins season is the Bruins' 83th season in the National Hockey League (NHL). == Regular season == == Playoffs == The Bruins lost to the Montreal Canadiens in the Conference Quarter-Finals 3 games to 4. ==References== Category:2007 in ice hockey CAtegory:2008 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League team seasons Category:2007 in Massachusetts Category:2008 in Boston
title: 2007–08 Boston Bruins season
